document.full_text: coach inc  reported a higher-than-expected quarterly profit as sales at its north american stores soared, but the upscale handbag maker warned that the disasters in japan would dent results.
document.title: coach profit rises but says japan will hurt
lines_and_colors: coach inc  reported a higher-than-expected quarterly profit as sales at its north american stores soared, but the upscale handbag maker warned that the disasters in japan would dent results.
